item1.text: A very simple two-player chess game built using the libGDX game development framework. I made the project to specifically hone my skills with OOP

item3.text: This is a small CSS challenge from Frontend Mentor I took to improve my skills before completing this task.

item4.text: This is another small CSS challenge from Frontend Mentor I took to improve my skills before completing this task.

item5.text: I'd like to include this as a project because it felt like a real accomplishment to develop everything from scratch while learning Liquid Templating at the same time.
